```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# 1️⃣ Load packages
library(DBI)
library(RMariaDB)
library(dplyr)

# 2️⃣ Get credentials from environment variables
user <- Sys.getenv("MYSQL_USER")
pw   <- Sys.getenv("MYSQL_PWD")

# 3️⃣ Connect to MySQL
con <- dbConnect(
  RMariaDB::MariaDB(),
  user = user,
  password = pw,
  host = "127.0.0.1",
  port = 3306,
  dbname = "album_ratings"
)
